---
title: "Lectures and topics"
---

## Recent course lectures

```{r, echo=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
lectures <- list.files(path = "courses/2016-2017_WSR/", pattern = "*.html", recursive = T)

#links <- sprintf('topics/%s', topics)

lectures.names <- gsub("_|(.html)|*/", " ", lectures)

links <- sprintf('<a href="courses/2016-2017_WSR/%s" target="_blank">%s</a>', lectures, lectures.names)

table <- data.frame(links)

# install.packages("DT")
library("DT")
datatable(table, escape = F, rownames = F)
```

## Topics

```{r, echo=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
topics <- list.files(path = "topics/", pattern = "*.html", recursive = T)

#links <- sprintf('topics/%s', topics)
```
